Class LogIn

java.lang.Object
application.LogIn
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LogIn extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for handling login and password recovery in the application. Manages UI events such as logging in, toggling password visibility, verifying OTP, and resetting the password. This class interacts with the Authentication service.
